mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1993 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the 1993 Barter Theatre Season. Productions include: Miracle Worker | Lend Me a Tenor by Ken Ludwig. Directed by Peter Bennett | Nunsense by Dan Goggin. Directed by Nancy Carroll | Cocktail Hour by A.R. Gurney. Directed by Ken Costigan | Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum | Frankie and Johnny in Clair deLune | Kuru | Other People's Money | Dracula.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
